Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the main game object responsible for managing the various components of the game.

    getWinner()
    Selects a single players as the winner based on: the score: the player with the highest score wins; the position relative to the first player: in case of draw (in terms of scores), the furthest player from the first player wins.

  • Method Details

    • evaluateFinalScores

      public void evaluateFinalScores()

    • getWinner

      public IPlayer getWinner()
      Selects a single players as the winner based on:
      • the score: the player with the highest score wins;
      • the position relative to the first player: in case of draw (in terms of scores), the furthest player from the first player wins.
      Returns:
      the player that has been declared winner. Returns null if there's no player that can be declared winner.

    • getCommonGoals

      public List<CommonGoalCard> getCommonGoals()
      Get the common goal cards set at the beginning of the game.
      Returns:
      the list of common goals.

    • getPlayers

      public List<IPlayer> getPlayers()
      Get the list of players in the current game.
      Returns:
      the list of players in the game.

    • getTurnManager

      public ITurnManager getTurnManager()
      Get the turn manager currently handling the progression of the game.
      Returns:
      the turn manager.

    • getBag

      public IBag getBag()
      Get the tiles bag currently being used in the game.
      Returns:
      the bag.

    • getBoard

      public IBoard getBoard()
      Get the board currently being used in the game.
      Returns:
      the board.

    • serialize

      public String serialize(Serializer serializer)
      Serializes the (current) state of the game to a string of data based on the type of serializer chosen.
      Specified by:
      serialize in interface Serializable
      Parameters:
      serializer - type of serializer used to serialize data.
      Returns:
